short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save live caption transcripts from Google Meet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CaptionSaver makes it super simple to save and download your Google Meet live captions. Just install the Chrome Extension, connect Google Drive and join your meetings.

Once your meeting finishes, you can save the entire transcript to Drive or download it to your computer.

About CaptionSaver Pro:

CaptionSaver Pro customers get access to features such as:

✓ Auto-Save to Google Drive (do you don't have to save it manually!)
✓ Highlighting
✓ Timestamps

And features coming soon:
✓ Auto-Organize by Date
✓ Integrations (let us know which ones!)
